## getViewConstructorByViewType() function

Get the view constructor by view type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getViewConstructorByViewType<
  TViewType extends ViewTypeType,
>(app: App, viewType: TViewType): ViewTypeViewConstructorMapping[TViewType];
```
